body: This functions like the mutiny event in the Mercenary Company Events table, except you may resolve the event with a different kind of challenge (such as racing through a gauntlet of traps instead of a duel, requiring several skill checks) and you can't attempt a Profession (soldier) check to end the event.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Downtime Events/Organization Events/Thieves Guild Events/Mutiny
name: Mutiny
